title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1265.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1265.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part shall
apply to: (1)
the construction of a new
residential structure; (2)
an
addition to an existing residential structure; and
(3)
the rehabilitation of an existing
residential structure. (b) This Part shall not apply in any city
having a population in excess of one million persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1265.2

Adopted

New

York State Register June 10, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 23, eff. 6/10/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
